definition: Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897/Korea, esp. South Korea 大韓民國|大韩民国/surname Han

sentences.english: He joined the military at seventeen. He served in World War Two and the Korean War.
sentences.chinese: 他十七歲加入軍隊，曾在二戰和韓戰中服役。

sentences.english: How did the Korean War begin and end?
This ruined bridge is a relic of the Korean War in 1950.
sentences.chinese: 這座廢棄的橋樑是是1950年韓戰的遺蹟。

sentences.english: What's more, the Korean War has never officially ended.
sentences.chinese: 尤有甚者，韓戰從未真正結束過。

sentences.english: One member of your correspondent's group was the son of a korean war veteran.
sentences.chinese: 一位元報導團的成員是個韓戰老兵的兒子。

sentences.english: One member of your correspondent's group was the son of a Korean war veteran.
sentences.chinese: 一位報道團的成員是個韓戰老兵的兒子。

definition: United Front (either of the two alliances between the Guomindang and the Communist Party, 1923-1927 and 1937-1945)
Autumn Harvest Uprising (1927), insurrection in Hunan and Jiangxi provinces led by Mao Zedong
the Mukden or Manchurian Railway Incident of 18th September 1931 used by the Japanese as a pretext to annex Manchuria/also known as Liutiaogou incident 柳條溝事變|柳条沟事变
to forfeit sovereignty and humiliate the country (idiom)/to surrender territory under humiliating terms
the Kempeitai or Japanese Military Police 1881-1945 (Japanese counterpart of the Gestapo during WWII)
North and South Korea/bilateral Korean relations
War of Liberation (1945-49), after which the Communists 共產黨武裝|共产党武装 under Mao Zedong 毛澤東|毛泽东 took over from the Nationalists 國民政府|国民政府 under Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
